channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Montana Gov. Gianforte continues to rake in outside income as he seeks a second term
item.description: Montana Republican Gov. Greg Gianforte reported more than $23 million in income over four years ending in 2022 as the former technology executive seeks reelection to a second term.

item.title: Donald Trump is going to North Carolina for an economic speech. Can he stick to a clear message?
item.description: Donald Trump will have an opportunity to recalibrate his presidential comeback bid with a rally and speech in North Carolina that his campaign is billing as a significant economic address.

item.title: Game of inches: Lobster fishermen say tiny change in legal sizes could disrupt imperiled industry
item.description: Fishing regulators are instituting a new rule that lobster fishermen must abide by stricter minimum sizes for the crustaceans they harvest.
